desc: Beautifully presented handmade wax melts in a variety of delicious long lasting scents and colours. The melts are made with 100% eco-soy wax and are of the highest quality. All melts are vegan friendly and cruelty free. Many sparkle with biodegradable plant based glitter. Shop online now.

layout.text: Scrummy wax melts and home scents

We are all about the Scents & Sparkle. Our beautiful hand poured reed diffusers, car perfumes and wax melts smell divine and are available in an array of scents and colours. Please take a peek at our range of home scents and gifts.
